metadata.name: Powershell Install a DLL in System Directory
metadata.comment: Uses PowerShell to install/copy a file into a system directory such as "System32" or "SysWOW64"

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (script.script_content.value rlike '\(Copy-Item|cpi\) .\{2,128\} -Destination .\{1,32\}\\\\Windows\\\\\(System32|SysWOW64\)')

output.summary: Uses PowerShell to install/copy a file into a system directory such as "System32" or "SysWOW64"
